OOC: Hey! I didn't say to grab him and do whatever ya want! My way is 
far better! Just hold on a sec. By the way, Dewie, this action is 
heavy moding, and I hope you realize it.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dewboy30816" <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> OOC:  Since WW put him up for grabs I'll take Burrock.
> 
> BIC:  Burrock exploded as his spark fell into the Pit (I don't know 
> what you other people say, but I strongly believe the Pit is Hell).
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > Gatara/Riekan/Jayde::
> > 
> > At about that moment, the three Rogues let loose their combined 
> > firepower against the unsuspecting Burrock.  Gatara fires first, 
> her 
> > fingers squeezing down on both her rifle's triggers, launching a 
> > barrage of magnum rounds and a grenade.  This acts as a signal for 
> > the other two: Riekan launches an explosive harpoon, and Jayde 
> fires 
> > several bursts from her ionic blaster.  (Much like the weapon that 
> > G1's Blast Off uses in robot mode, it doesn't physically damage 
its 
> > target, instead disrupting the electrical impulses that control 
> both 
> > organic and mechanoid nervous systems, causing spasms or possibly 
> > shorting a bot out altogether.)
> > 
> > Firing their weapons makes the Rogues temporarily visible, but 
they 
> > quicky scatter and recloak, seeking to assess the damage they 
> caused.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > Tyrael had not spotted Talon yet, and he started to not care 
> about 
> > > him. Seeing Waspinator go down and Perceptor transform made him 
> > smile 
> > > and laugh. Quickstrike was the next one standing. He sent four 
> > > luminous blasts at the weird looking bot.
> > > 
> > > Burrock took grasp of Waspinator's stasis locked form and threw 
> it 
> > at 
> > > Perceptor.
> > > 
> > > Burrock: Maybe that'll stop you! Whatever happens, you preds can 
> > not
